Individual therapy for women

Specializing in women's health and mental health, perinatal mood and anxiety disorders, and grief and loss.

Contact

About

I am a Licensed Clinical Social Worker specializing in women's health and mental health, pregnancy and postpartum issues, as well as grief and loss (including miscarriage, stillbirth, and TFMR).

I work to improve access to specialized maternal mental health care in our community. I provide private consultation and mentorship for therapists beginning their journey into the field of perinatal mental health. I especially enjoy supporting social work students and early career professionals.

My approach is grounded in empathy, evidence-based practices, and a deep commitment to creating a safe, supportive space for healing and growth.

My Approach

I believe in meeting each client where they are, using a collaborative and strengths-based approach to therapy. My therapeutic style integrates evidence-based practices with compassionate, individualized care.

I draw from multiple therapeutic modalities including Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT), Emotionally Focused Therapy, and EMDR to provide comprehensive support tailored to your unique needs and goals.

Whether you're navigating life transitions, processing grief and loss, or working through perinatal mental health challenges, I'm here to support you on your journey toward healing and resilience.
